title: Client Crashes triggering leaver buster
body: Anyway to resolve the title? my client was crashing repeatedly and now i'm at a 20 minute wait to get into a game. The crashes were caused by Driver errors which i hopefully fixed.

replies.body: The best way to restore your standing with leaverbuster is to play consistently without leaves.  I'm glad you were able to figure out the cause!  Let me know if you still have any issues and I'd be happy to help.
